fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Send a player into the void at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- They're removed from the game entirely, and re-added to the game at the beginning of the next night.
- All actions that happen to them that night will fail, but won't give notifications that they failed.
- You may send yourself into the void.
- Cope, seethe, and mald
- Spite Rasen
- You cannot target the same person twice in a row. You're welcome.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.
